item.title: Modular Guix System
item.description: A Reusable Guix System Configuration Gnu Guix System has always been my favourite Linux operating system. It’s uses the Linux Libre kernel, uses a rolling release system for packages, and it’s a declarative operating system1. The init system itself is managed using GNU Shepherd init system. Installing GNU Guix Using the manual installation Guix actually have a nice terminal interface for “graphical” installation. Later after the installation, you can edit the configuration file.
